entry.title: The Games We Play
entry.summary:
Author: Katia_Earley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,396Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 194

Summary: A truth universally acknowleged at Wayne Enterprises is that Damian Wayne hates Timothy Drake, and vice versa. Nothing more, and nothing less. However when a new job listing goes up and they both aim to clinch the position, feelings other than hate began to develope. With a set goal in mind, is this a game Damian is willing to play?
